name: packrat
description: PackRat is the ultimate adventure planner designed for those who love to explore the great outdoors. Our app helps users plan and organize their trips with ease, whether it's a weekend camping trip, a day hike, or a cross-country road trip.

scripts.clean: rm -rf server/node_modules && rm -rf client/node_modules && rm -rf server/package-lock.json && rm -rf client/package-lock.json
scripts.setup: npm run setup:root && npm run setup:client && npm run setup:server
scripts.setup:client: npm --prefix client install && npm --prefix client run setup
scripts.setup:server: npm --prefix server install && npm --prefix server run setup
scripts.build:client: npm install --prefix client && npx --prefix client expo export --platform web
scripts.expo:export: cd client && cp app.example.json app.json && npx expo export --platform web

author: Andrew Bierman
